sentence.Network_en: They treat their seeds with a fungicide to combat seedling diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们用杀真菌剂浸了种子来防止秧苗受病.

sentence.Network_en: A new process for preparing the new fungicide - silicon - containing triazole derivative is described.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要对一种新型的杀菌剂 - 含硅的三氮唑衍生物的合成进行了改进,并给出了一条新的合成路线.

sentence.Network_en: A new broad spectrum fungicide cyprodinil was briefly reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 简介了新型广谱杀菌剂嘧菌环胺.

...物质，这种有机体可能是植物（除草剂）、昆虫（杀虫剂）、哺乳动物［灭鼠药（rodenticide）］，或是霉菌［杀霉菌剂（fungicide）］。和本书介绍的其他化学物（抗生素和抗癌药除外）不一样的是，杀虫剂是针对某种特定活有机体特别制造成具.

...有机磷杀菌剂编辑目录1简介2品种1简介有机磷杀菌剂(organophosphorus fungicide)，具有杀菌或抑菌活性的含磷有机化合物杀菌剂。其基本化学结构是磷酸酯、硫代磷酸酯、磷酰胺类等。.

entry.def: A fungicide is a chemical that can be used to kill fungus or to prevent it from growing.

means.word_mean: 1. any agent that destroys or prevents the growth of fungi

auth_sentence.content: Triphenyltin is still licensed as a fungicide.

auth_sentence.content: Treating particularly susceptible plants at fortnightly intervals with a fungicide may provide a barrier against infection.
